mapper.select: select distinct cat_name from common_price where state = '1' and status = '1'

select distinct market_name from common_price where state = '1' and status = '1'
and cat_name = #{hotword}
select distinct specifaction from common_price where state = '1' and status = '1' and cat_name = #{hotword}

SELECT id, price_date, IFNULL( cat_name, '' ) AS cat_name, IFNULL( specifaction, '' ) AS specifaction, IFNULL( product_name, '' ) AS product_name, IFNULL( market_name, '' ) AS market_name, IFNULL( price, '' ) AS price, IFNULL( in_time, '' ) AS in_time, IFNULL( state, '' ) AS state, IFNULL( STATUS, '' ) AS STATUS FROM common_price WHERE state = '1' AND STATUS = '1' ORDER BY price_date DESC, in_time DESC LIMIT 0,6

select * from common_price where status = '1'
AND (cat_name like CONCAT('%',#{hotword},'%') OR market_name like CONCAT('%',#{hotword},'%') OR specifaction like CONCAT('%',#{hotword},'%') OR product_name like CONCAT('%',#{hotword},'%'))
AND market_name IS NOT NULL
AND product_name IS NOT NULL
AND state = '1'
AND state = '0'
AND price_date >= #{start_time}
AND price_date <= #{end_time}
ORDER BY price_date
mapper.update: update common_price set state = #{state} where id = #{id}
